reviews.review_text: We had the chicken waffles and steak sandwich, both are very delicious and servings were generous! The chicken was crispy and juicy. The steak sandwich was very tender and well seasoned. No accessibility for wheelchair or strollers but the staff were very friendly and they helped us get our stroller up the few flights of stairs. Thank you!

I had a great experience here! We came here for happy hour for oysters. $2 for regular oysters and $3 for premium. We got 2 dozens of oysters, the poutine and calamari. The service was also great! Highly recommend.

Incredible happy hour joint. Had drinks and some oysters & beers. Extremely warm service and vibes in general. Will be back for sure. Edit: My brother dropped his phone through the deck. We met the owner who went above and beyond to help us to retrieve the phone.  We even ended up staying for dinner which was incredible.  Jambalaya, mussels and carfish which were all excellent. Kid-friendliness: Good for kids
We came for oysters during happy hours but the deep fried food (i.e. calamari, chicken wings) is also good. I love their craft beers too.

Awesome happy hour in a relaxed cozy environment with friendly staff that will make you feel at home.  The happy hour offers were limited but good!  The calamari was tender and delicious!  Service was solid!
I had a great experience there. Everything was excellent. The oysters were delicious a good place to stop in and enjoy the food and atmosphere.
Small portion sizes but the quality of the food is top tier (Calamari and local oysters)! Tremendous local BC dry cider as well that Im extremely impressed with! Food

We hosted my daughters first birthday at their Kits location and it was amazing!!  The staff are super friendly.  This is a restaurant owned by a lovely husband and wife  (Jamie and Mel) who I had the pleasure of coordinating this event with Mel also offers decor/ ballon arch packages that you can coordinate with her for special events. The attention to detail Mel provided was incredible. I would highly recommend either one of the chewies locations for your next special event.
Came here for Dine Out 2023 and the menu was fantastic! Each course we got was very delicious.
After having the oysters and their fried spicy broccoli I think you cant go wrong with anything on their menu. Just exceptional.

The oysters here are so fresh! The fried broccoli, calamari, and jambalaya were all excellent too. The service was impeccable and friendly. Would highly recommend Chewies to anyone visiting Vancouver. I ve read some of the negative reviews and they are way off. This place completely turned my outlook on oysters around. 11/10 would recommend.

Had an amazing experience at Chewies. They accommodated a table of 20+ people on short notice on a sunny Saturday evening. Staff were awesome and the owner even came out to offer us some complimentary tequila. Food and drinks were delicious, 100% would recommend and I will be back. Oysters were awesome with a great selection as well.

I love this place! Perfect location, relatively easy to park, and medium-priced menu. There are two patios on both sides of the bar and one is heated. Waiters and waitresses are cool and approachable. I visited this bar about 3 times and once my friend ordered fries with her food, and she got tiny, tiny little fries, like half inch pieces, that was super weird and also difficult to eat. When I asked the waiter why they were so tiny, he said that the size does not matter. Yes, man, it DOES! ...Especially when we talk about fries.

Amazing happy hour menu! $1.75-$2.50 oysters and they were so plump and fresh! Happy hour food: hot wings, calamari and spicy broccoli. The calamari was melt in your mouth tender and the broccoli was actually a nice tasty surprise!

I had such a lovely time here! Corey who was shucking oysters was super helpful and nice and fun. The whole staff were killer and the drinks were well balanced and fairly priced. When I come back to Vancouver Ill be back for sure :)

Really missed the one on Hastings but Donavin and Jim were there and it felt like home again! Loved their service, the food and the grad and baby pics of the staff had. This Chewies has been around for me since I first worked at kits in 2017, though I worked in DT now I ll make the run back for the great fresh oysters and friendly service
Went one day and had the special (tuna ceviche) and it was amazing, definitely you have the best hazy IPA beer in city, great service and staff, always feel very welcomed at this place.

Family met up for Saturday brunch. Incidently, its recently that they offer brunch. The menu is very creative to say the least. I had the grab bennie that was so artfully presented that we had to take pictures with our phones. All other items ordered were equally visually appealing.  The food was wonderful. The service was great too. All in all a great experience that will have be duplicated in the futue.

Excellent establishment right next to the beach, incredible choice of oysters as well as plenty of interesting drinks to try. I will definitely be visiting every time I come to kits Beach and recommend you do the same. Ask for Rich, hell definitely sort you out.

We decided to eat here for Dine Out Vancouver and were not disappointed. Our mains were Chicken & Grits and Jambalaya - they were *chefs kiss*. My partner had the oysters and he says theyre the best hes ever had. Big portions, reasonably priced, fun and friendly atmosphere. The staff were outstanding from the time we booked our reservation until the time we left. Food came out as soon as it was ready, empty plates picked up quickly and our glasses were always full....and this is on a busy Friday night. Fantastic job following COVID protocols. Would give 100 stars if I could.
Get the cornbread. It was so good!!! Mussels were tasty and jambalaya had a unique twist to to, drier than traditional ones but still very flavourful. It s a neat resto near the beach.
The food is delicious and the portions are VERY generous. We had the Chicken and Grits, Jambalaya, and the poutine. AMAZING. Service was awesome too
First time at this location. Oysters are good loved the kushti. Cajun fries are tasty as well!
Wonderful place walking distance from Kitsilano beach. Great selection of fresh shucked oysters. Servers and very personable and knowledgeable. A very pleasant dining experience.

Everything here was amazing and delicious. The mac and cheese we ordered twice because we loved it so much the first time. The pecan pie was fantastic. I dont even love pecan pie that much lol. The service was spectacular too. Must check out here.

Me and my partner looove chewies!!!! Menu can be pricy if ur not there at happy hour but it always feels worth it for the great time that we have there. And its honestly it s standard price for Vancouver so I really don t have anything to complain about. Love the staff. Food is bomb. Happy hour is great. This is our top spot in Vancouver. Always looking forward to next time. Thanks for everything guys. So much love to you

Update: Jamie, the owner, called me directly to hear my feedback. He handled the situation well and I certainly appreciated his call and his willingness to hear my feedback. I ve changed my rating from 3 stars to 5 stars. Original Review: I ve been coming to Chewies for years, mostly on Sundays. I ve recently been back after COVID. Our  experience was less than optimal. The food was great all around, however the service was not great in the slightest. It took close to ten minutes for someone to come over. Once they did, we placed our order, but from there, we constantly had to ask for obvious things. More water, another drink, new fork, the bill, etc. Our entire time was spent trying to flag down the server to either order additional items or ask for common things. Not intuitive or on top of it at all. We also came at a time in which there were limited tables in the restaurant. The server probably had one or two tables to look out for. Disappointing. Chewies has always been a favourite destination, especially in Kits, because, you can head for a walk down the beach after your meal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Nicholas, I apologize for the delay in getting back to you. First and foremost I would like to extend my appreciation for the support for Chewies over the past. My name is Jamie and I am the owner. Very rarely do I reply to the comments, but this one I felt it necessary. A post like this is obviously a double edged sword. I appreciate the fact that you have been a long time supporter, and the food was great, but the issue with the service is concerning. As I have always tried to stress to our service staff, service first, anything else second. It has been a very trying time since things have reopened. There is a definite lack of staff both FOH, and BOH which has made things even more complicated. By no means am I trying to make any excuses, and I would like to know exactly what time and when it happened (assuming it was on the Sunday, Aug 2nd). But just wanted to clarify. I/we take pride in our service and to have this happen is concerning. I would like to offer you a GC on us as a thank you for bringing this up, but more so an apology for your experience. Please let me know your thoughts. Thank you again for your support! Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: AMAZING service, oysters, fried chicken and grits, and fish and chips! Will definitely be going back to try more. 10/10 would recommend
GREAT oysters in many varieties, good and fresh. Good drinks and exceptional staff! Absolutely recommend
We ordered oysters, mussels and the sea food salad, it was really fresh, well dressed and tasty. The waiter was also really nice. I recommend it. Food

I was having a really bad night....but then Angus made it way better. Great server, great attitude, he gave my dog some sausage and water, just a great guy!!! We will be back for more oysters and maybe some sausage for Doug!

I can t say enough about the food, the people and the service at Chewies. Hands down the best calamari in the city! It s fresh, delicious, and a great appetizer before their famous fried chicken. We are fans
I would highly recommend. Amazing place to get your southern fried chicken and oysters. Staff are amazing, friendly, and accommodating.

Theres a lot to like about this hidden gem in kits beach area. The staff are down to earth and friendly. Service was always very attentive even when the restaurant was full and our server somehow managed to get our entire tables orders correct and bill everyone correctly which is amazing given he never wrote anything down! . We didnt get enough time to try out all the choices but we will go back. The Cajun Creole style mussels with sausage were delicious and my partners burger was apparently awesome, and he is quite the picky burger connoisseur. The price point was also in the affordable, not break the bank range. So combine all those things and its defineately worth 5 stars.
Delicious! Great service and great food. All reasonably priced too.
New Orleans is one of my fav cities for cuisine and Chewies does a great job with it in Kitsilano. Staff are great and long timers. Ask for a glass of wine and see their meniscus pours!!
10/10 experience at the best restaurant in Kits. New brunch menu is also FIRE! Highly recommend.
Loved this restaurant! Really great service and the food was awesome - good variety and had local seafood options. Would definitely go back!
Situated in the middle of the Kits residential neighborhood, its a nice location with a chill atmosphere. The food is good but pricing is on the higher side.
Best service because its genuine, and god the food is simple but executed to a mouth watering symphony. DO NOT Overlook the chicken and grit. To die for.
We came here for oysters and it did not disappoint. Super fresh and tasty. Great service and staff.

I love Chewies! It s our great neighborhood spot in Kits where you re always welcome to drop in for a drink and maybe a dozen oysters.  Oysters are premium quality, good selection of local craft beer and BC wine.  And if you re hungry, the fried chicken can t be beat.  Service A++.

The menu is focused on a southern seafood experience. While initially, I felt the menu a little small, I can appreciate them focusing on what theyre good at. Deets: The seafood chowder was the best if had in years: generous recognizable content. Soooo many tender scallops! The BBQ oysters were perfectly el dante. The tasty breaded chicken was so crispy but the protein moist. Overall: great brass band music played while friendly outgoing staff checked in regularly. Casual and fun.

I brought my mom to Chewies for the first time. She loved the food and the atmosphere. The Oysters, seafood salad, and their traditional fried chicken were on point as usual! The service was great. The food runner went above and beyond. Im glad to see you guys still have the magic touch. See you again soon!
Love everything about this place. The staff, the food, the drinks and especially the ambiance. I have such great appreciation for what this company has given to their beloved community and city.

One of the best for fresh oysters and our hostess Scarlett was so sweet and so helpful and the manager Corey was awesome too he helped us with an issue we had with our table and went above and beyond to make sure my husband and I had a great experience and Scarlett was so helpful and attentive as well we will be coming back thank you !

Finding this place seriously made our day. We stumbled across the restaurant while looking for a nice patio to sit on in the sun. Not only was the patio perfect but the food was out of this world. Service staff were friendly and accommodating. Will definitely go back next time I m in Kitz.
Honestly we did have the best seat in the house which helps. Besides that their ribs were some of the best ribs Ive ever had. I would also go back for their Fried Chicken.
The platter was SO good, especially the collard greens and chicken. Mac n cheese was a bit bland but everything else made up for it. Be sure the get into the honey butter with the chicken!!
Arrived early for the oysters! Excellent! Quick service
Great bar, expansive menu and excellent food. Service was slightly slow but they made up for it with how nice they were.
Unbelievable food and service, will definitely come back!
Only place I can find deep fried chicken skins and its the best!!! Staff also nice.
Love the oysters, the way they pour wine & the brussel sprouts!!! & more mmm
Wonderful oysters and wonderful service (the kind that makes you want to tip)
Nice relaxed ambiance, chill but attentive servers, decent food, and really great happy hour! Also great location for heading to the beach before or after
I wished for a bigger variety of cajun food, but what they served was excellent!
Food a drinks were great killer place to go to on a Friday night after the beach

1 year later. Good food and good service May 2017 5 stars. Good food, the oysters were as fresh as could be possible. Service was excellent, and the server had a great understanding of the menu, and how some of their dishes were different from the typical presentation. Good food, indifferent service. Aug 2016 3 stars Our server really didnt care about us. The place was busy, but he was more interested in socializing with one of the women sitting at the bar than remembering to bring our order. He didnt tell us about the happy hour price for oysters (it started 20 minutes after we arrived). He also sold us a bottle of wine that was available to $20 less at happy hour. The only good service we had was when we paid the bill. The server seemed quite happy that we were leaving. The food was good, but not worth putting up with the service. We noticed that the tables on either side of us also seemed to be getting poor service.

I went here with a group of friends a few weeks ago for the first time and will definitely be going back! The happy hour runs from 3-6pm on Saturday and Sunday which was great for us because we were hungry after shopping on 4th! I would highly recommend ordering the broccoli and poutine. Patio was also heated and open when we were there. Go check it out!
Loved this place. Super friendly staff and fast service. The fish and chips was well cooked and I definitely will be back for it.

When you dont know Chewies in Kits you tell yourself youre going for the food... Well I keep going there weekly, now. Because not only the food is superb, but the staff is the reason I go there. Theyre great and thoughtful... and they wear shorts. Definitely one of the best Canadian dining experience!!

Absolutely love this place. Theres so much great food here. Though it might be slow at times that is to be expected due to the large amounts of people who come. Oysters are a must here. There is not many spots so make sure to figure that out by calling ahead to check. Enjoyable and one of the better oyster spots in the city for sure
Best happy hour in town. Tasty locally sourced oysters on happy hour menu. Good variety of pints for the lads

This place was amazing! My girlfriend and I came here after a sunny day at Kitsilano Beach/Pool, the staff was very friendly, accommodating and had us a table on the patio inside ten minutes. The food was the best part: Deep-fried Cauliflower (easily the best thing on the platter), Fried Brussel Sprouts with Gorgonzola Cheese, Cajun Fries and Cajun Fried Chicken. Beer selection was pretty good and the wine selection seemed even better. Even after my beers, her wine and the platter of food the bill was around $120.00 for the both of us - well deserved in my opinion.

Love this place! It is by far one of my favourite places to dine on the weekend with my wife/family or have a nice ice cold beer after work. Their Breakfast is to die for and I highly recommend you come try it on the weekends before your stroll down the street to Kits beach. They also have an amazing selection of oysters and very knowledgeable shuckers. I have had some of the best oysters of my life at Chewies. Location, food, drinks, ambiance, and staff are all 10/10. When ever I have someone visiting town this is a place I always take them to. The room and staff really make you feel at home and thats a big reason why I always come back. My wife and I are there at least once a week and this is a Kitsilano/Vancouver staple. Family owned and operated I will definitely continue to be a loyal patron. Thanks crew de chew you never disappoint!

Very delicious and wonderful atmosphere. Oysters are varied and delicious and the 4 house sauces they serve with them elevate the experience to the next level. Definitely worth trying to catch happy hour! Great place to kill a couple beers and chat with friends.

We went during happy hour on a Tuesday and it was absolutely incredible. Oysters were so fresh, and only a buck each. Half priced appetizers, and the entrees were awesome. The calamari was perfect. Also excellent service. I would go back in a heartbeat!
Had a phenomenal time back in December with my softball team. Food was amazing, staff was fantastic, and this place lived up to the hype. Bravo!

Great place! Was only able to try the chicken skins which was so good and well priced too! The drinks are quite pricey but its a cool place. Fun to sit at the bar and feel sorry for the guy who has to shuck oysters all night! They have a happy hour so make the most of it!

The absolute best place to grab a bite, have a drink, and hangout. Their oysters are wicked good. Love all their sauces. Huge fan of the jambalaya. Fried chicken and waffles for brunch. Amazing. Oh and dont forget the brussel sprouts. Service there is top notch and theyll always make you feel like youve been there a million times, everytime. Favorite spot in Kits for sure

Went for  dinner last night with a few friends.. Exceptional service Great happy hour offerings Delicious calamari and tuna ceviche Oysters top notch as always Our group had burgers ( they said the best they have ever had ) prawn wrap - delicious ! Would highly recommend Chewies in Kits!
Amazing service, fantastic food! My partner has a dairy allergy and the staff let us know immediately what had dairy in it! 10/10 I do recommend!

A cozy neighborhood restaurant with an incredibly strong staff that definitely have been expertly staffed to facilitate an incredibly unique oyster and barbeque fusion experience. With nods to a creole style of exploration of tastes with locally and coast to coast availability for oysters, tucked on the corner of an incredibly lively Kitsilano street steps away from the coveted Kits beach. Reservations are recommended.

This trendy, casual space was perfect for our date night. The single wide booths by the upper bar were an ideal spot to sit, chat, drink, eat and relax. The attentive wait-staff guides us to ideal beer, cocktail and food selections. All in all our best stop yet in Kitsilano. Bonus points: West coast oysters were perfectly shucked and presented, with top notch horseradish to boot.
Most friendliest bunch of staff ever. Amazing oysters and brilliant service. Highly recommended.

The serving staff of this restaurant (particularly Tony our server) provided some of the best service I have ever seen in a restaurant. I have celiac and the chef (Mauricio) knew that I was not able to order their typical menu items and came over to specifically provide customized options that I was able to choose from. All amazing! I will absolutely come back here and you should go here too.
Great happy hour, friendly and approachable service from the boys. Best brunch in the city, on God. Good vibes!

Great experience from start to finish. Friendly staff on arrival, hilarious servers and super tasty food and oysters.  Coming back to try the chicken and waffles for brunch next. Definitely a kits hot spot!

Big fan, fried chicken was awesome, the buttermilk mashed potatoes were incredible and my wife also had an amazing gumbo. We are planning to try brunch one of these days, as the checked and waffles look great. Great southern style food!

Alright, so the meal was fantastic. The oysters were fresh and delicious, the mussels and fried chicken were out of this world! But as great as the food was, my main man Corey was the server and that dude was next level. Easily the most entertaining server Ive ever had, if youre going to want to share a beer or teo with a server at a restaurant, thats the dude. Keep it up Corey!

Came in on a busy Saturday and we had a great time. The food was amazing, 2 of us had the fried green tomato poboy, 1 plate of jambalaya and 1 fish and grits. Everything was great. All the food was recommended by our waiter Tim who was a hilarious, nice guy. I highly Recommend the restaurant for everything, drinks, food and good company.

we had the portabella burger w/ fries, the UNREAL jalapeno grits and oysters. Andy gave us unreal table service start to finish. Answered all our questions about the different types of oysters we received, highlighting the best attributes of each. The oysters were fresh and succulent. The fries were well seasoned but not too salty. The portable burger could ve had a bit more structured it definitely slips out one end, my recommendation is to make a bed of the fries for the burger to spill over onto. Fantastic service start to finish, experiences like this are why I go out for meals and why I will be definitely coming back to Chewies Kits for date night and beyond. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.

Great food, great people! Atmosphere is laid back and welcoming. Drink menu is amazing and the fried chicken is to die for! I bring all my friends visiting Vancouver here and they talk about it for months after! 10/10 must go!

Absolutely incredible! Best fried chicken you will ever eat whether its at dinner with the amazing mashed potatoes or at brunch with the best waffle Ive ever eaten! Ive also had the Beef Brisket: AMAZING! Anything you eat there is the best! And of course.... THE OYSTERS! The home made sauces they have there to go with their massive section of raw oysters is divine. My wife and I usually get the Oyters Rockefeller. Its so good we cant stop ordering it every time we go. The drinks are also top notch. Best Cesar Ive ever had and their wine is filled to the brim. Youve got to try Chewies or youre just missing out and hell... youre just not living! :-)

The BEST fried chicken. So crispy and tasty. My favourite is their fried chicken main that comes with mash and a gorgeous honey butter glaze. Delicious. The chicken and waffles is also very good. My one issue with this spot is it is a bit on the pricey side.
For good reasons one of the most well known happy hour places in the area.
One of the best happy hours place.

Great service, got the buck a shuck happy hour oysters and jambalaya, and my companion got the halibut. Both dishes were excellent. Im upset I didnt get the fried chicken and finding parking can be a bit annoying so give yourself extra time.

Staff and oysters were the highlight of this great little oyster bar! We had the happy hour oysters and they were so fresh and delicious! Loved the cucumber vinaigrette the best! Thanks for a lovely experience:)

I know one of the owners, Chewi. Great man! And the few times Ive been, Ive never left unhappy. Great atmosphere and service :) Too bad Im allergic to oysters. I hear theyre really amazing! Ill have to come by again sometime soon :)
We go there often for the oysters and happy hour, never been disappointed
Best oyster bar in all categories: fresh and delicious, friendly people, and cozy interior. Aside from the oysters, we love their calamari!

We love Chewies for Happy Hour - great service from all the staff every time we are there. The calamari is probably the best we ve ever had! We have made it our local. Thanks Jim, Corey and the rest of the gang!
Oysters were amazing and not too expensive

Fantastic Oyster Bar with great food, great service, and a very fun atmosphere. One of the best watering holes for the Kitsilano neighbourhood. Love going here. Highly recommend to everybody and anybody
Friendly service and a good vibe. Although its an oyster bar their fried chicken and grits is phenomenal.

Awesome for oysters. When I was there place was very busy and they had very good choices of oysters from BC and Washington including my favorite - Kusshi. I would like to see better choice of sauces served with raw oysters.

Chewies are situated in the heart of Kits. I usually go here for my Saturday or Sunday brunch. With lots of 2hr parking in the area, this location feels natural amd easy to get to. They serve some really good oysters and a great variety too! My 2 favourite items on the menu is the Spicy Ceasar (seriously amazing) and the Chicken & Waffles.

Came for the happy hour and stayed for dinner. Great food choices and wide selection of drinks. Fast friendly staff that made the experience wonderful. Recommended for casual get together with friends or family.
